assemblage.title: 🧮 Calculator Tip
assemblage.p: For partial totals with level payments, you can use the AMORT worksheet. Set P1 to be the first payment in the series, and set P2 to be the last. The calculator will tell you the sum of all interest payments and all principal payments in between P1 and P2. If P1 = 1 and P2 is n, this gives you I_T and Pr_T.
